summary: Completed testing of P1 bug fixes: 1) Reviews page Request/Follow-up webhooks working correctly with success toasts, 2) Probate Detail page loads without 'Client Role' field (field removed as it doesn't exist in Airtable), 3) Sidebar action modals still working correctly after bug fixes.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: Backend: Login endpoint returns 200 with valid credentials - PASS
Backend: /api/webhooks/send-review-request endpoint exists and validates input - PASS
Backend: /api/webhooks/send-review-followup endpoint exists and validates input - PASS
Backend: send-review-request with valid data returns success - PASS
Backend: send-review-followup with valid data returns success - PASS
Backend: Master list record fetch works correctly - PASS
Backend: Master list record update works correctly - PASS
Backend: Completed matters fetch for Reviews page works - PASS
Frontend: Reviews page loads with Request and Follow Up buttons - PASS
Frontend: Request button sends webhook and shows success toast 'Review request sent successfully' - PASS
Frontend: Follow Up button sends webhook and shows success toast 'Review follow-up sent successfully' - PASS
Frontend: Probate Detail page loads without 'Client Role' field (bug fix verified) - PASS
Frontend: Probate Detail page shows all expected Case Information fields - PASS
Frontend: Sidebar action modals (Add Client, Add Lead, Add Task) still work correctly - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components for better accessibility (minor)
context_for_next_testing_agent: P1 bug fixes verified: 1) Reviews page webhooks now go through backend API endpoints (/api/webhooks/send-review-request and /api/webhooks/send-review-followup) with proper error handling and success toasts. Backend updates Airtable with correct status values ('Initial Email & Text Sent ' with trailing space and 'Follow Up Email & Text Sent'). 2) 'Client Role' field removed from Probate Detail page as it doesn't exist in Airtable schema. All sidebar action modals continue to work correctly.
